description: People arriving on the Isle of Man must pay for a Covid-19 test or face a longer isolation under new rules.
title: Covid-19: Returning Manx residents to be tested to 'shore up defences'
title_page: Covid-19: Returning Manx residents to be tested to 'shore up defences' - BBC News
maintext: Mr Quayle said it was "inevitable that the mutated virus will make its way to the Isle of Man" and so it was "prudent to be certain" that all those arriving were "free from the virus before leaving self-isolation".
